thread.title: ABF Logistics Recognizes Moving Service Suppliers at Annual Conference
thread.title_full: ABF Logistics Recognizes Moving Service Suppliers at Annual Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: ABF Logistics Recognizes Moving Service Suppliers at Annual Conference
text:
ArcBest Corporation
- More than 150 participants from 38 states attend two-day event held in Dallas
FORT SMITH, Ark. , Oct. 21, ABF Logistics SM , an ArcBest company (Nasdaq: ARCB), recently recognized seven moving service suppliers at its 2 nd Annual ABF Logistics Supplier Conference, held in Dallas October 7-8 .
"We felt it was important to recognize our moving partners who have provided exceptional services over the last year," said Jason Turner , chief operating officer of ABF Logistics. "These valued relationships are important to our goal of providing a seamless experience to our customers."
Moving service suppliers provide origin and destination services including packing, loading and unloading. Outstanding performers were recognized at an awards dinner and ceremony held on October 7 at the Marriott Solana Hotel in Westlake, Texas . Those receiving awards were:
Moving Supplier of the Year – Overall : Coast to Coast Moving & Storage of Tampa, Florida Moving Supplier of the Year – Military Services : Stewart Moving & Storage of Midlothian, Virginia Moving Supplier of the Year – Military Origin Services : Aabco Moving & Storage of El Cajon, California Moving Supplier of the Year – Military Hauling Services : Executive Moving Systems Inc. of Woodbridge, Virginia Moving Supplier of the Year – Consumer Services : Move Help Made Easy of Scottsdale, Arizona Moving Supplier of the Year – Consumer Standard Services : Silverline Movers LLC of Atlanta Moving Supplier of the Year – Consumer Plus Services : Unlimited Moving Services of Lewisville, Texas This year's conference was opened to providers of ABF Logistics and its sister companies: ABF Freight SM , Panther Premium Logistics ® and FleetNet America ® . More than 150 participants traveled from 38 states and two Canadian provinces to attend the event, which focused on providing opportunities for capacity partners to collaborate on future business opportunities and recognizing the top network performers for service excellence.
The two-day event included a VIP guided tour of AT&T Cowboys Stadium and an opportunity for team introductions and breakout sessions at one of ABF Logistics' offices located in Wichita Falls, Texas .
"In years to come, we see this conference and the associated quality award presentation growing across our various capacity networks that help us serve a variety of customers across the ArcBest enterprise," Turner said. "This broader inclusion demonstrates the conference theme of 'connecting through collaboration' as we focus on new ways to provide seamless solutions to our customers."
As an ArcBest company, ABF Logistics offers customers access to a comprehensive service portfolio designed to solve unique logistics challenges and deliver everyday shipments.
ABOUT ABF LOGISTICS
ABF Logistics SM provides third-party logistics services including brokerage, intermodal and ocean transport, transportation management, warehousing and household moving. We have the skill and the will to build and deliver seamless, customized supply chain solutions powered by advanced technology with access through a single point of contact.
ABOUT ARCBEST
ArcBest Corporation SM (Nasdaq: ARCB) solves complex logistics and transportation challenges. Our companies and brands – ABF Freight SM , ABF Logistics SM , Panther Premium Logistics®, FleetNet America®, U-Pack®, ArcBest Enterprise Solutions and ArcBest Technologies – apply the skill and the will with every shipment and supply chain solution, household move or vehicle repair. ArcBest finds a way.
For more information, visit arcb.com, abf.com, pantherpremium.com, fleetnetamerica.com and upack.com. ArcBest Corporation SM . The Skill & The Will SM .
Media Contact: Kathy Fieweger
Phone: 479-719-4358
Email: kfieweger@arcb.com
